palette.title: Palette control
palette.desc: Our image to pixel art converter gives precise palette control. Choose built-in retro palettes or auto-extract tones from your image, then lock, reorder, and fine-tune hues to match your style. With consistent palettes, your image to pixel art conversions keep sprites readable, game-ready, and easy to reuse across projects.

live.title: Live adjustments
live.desc: Tweak pixel size, dithering, contrast, and brightness while your image to pixel art results update instantly. Side-by-side changes appear with no lag, so you can compare options and settle on the perfect look faster. Live preview reduces guesswork and keeps your image to pixel art conversions predictable on every export.

clientSide.title: 100% client‚Äëside
clientSide.desc: All conversion runs 100% client-side in your browser. Images never leave your device, and offline builds are possible, keeping assets private and safe. Pixel Art Village protects your work while delivering fast, secure processing across desktop and mobile. With Pixel Art Village you retain control from first preview to final export.

overview.title: Overview
overview.p1: pixel art Village respects your privacy. This policy explains what data we process, how we use cookies (including Google AdSense cookies), and your choices. If you have questions, please contact us via the email on the Contact page.

local.title: Local Image Processing
local.p1: Your images never leave your device. All image processing happens locally in your browser. We do not upload, store, or share your image files on our servers.

collect.title: Information We Collect
collect.li1: Technical data for site operation (e.g., basic device/browser info) necessary to deliver the service.
collect.li2: Usage data in aggregate to improve features (if analytics is enabled, we avoid collecting personally identifiable information).
collect.li3: Advertising data from Google AdSense (see below) if ads are displayed.
collect.p2: We do not require account registration. We do not knowingly collect sensitive personal data.

faq.title: pixel art Village: Frequently Asked Questions

items.question: The site shows a blank page or crashes ‚Äî what should I do?
items.answer: Some browser extensions inject development runtimes (e.g., Plasmo/BacklinkPilot) into every page, which can break React apps. Please disable those extensions on this site and hard‚Äërefresh (Ctrl/Cmd+Shift+R).

items.question: Is this digital image maker with palette controls free?
items.answer: Yes. Image Village is a completely free online image tool for all users. Enjoy unlimited image conversions, custom palette controls, and high-resolution downloads with advanced palettes without any cost.

items.question: Is my image private? Do you upload image files?
items.answer: Your image privacy is guaranteed. Your image files never leave your device as all image processing is done locally in your browser. Image Village cannot access your image files, making it a secure digital image creator from your images with palette options.

items.question: How do I turn a image into a game sprite with custom palette?
items.answer: Our digital image maker with palette controls is perfect for creating game sprites. Upload your character's image, adjust the size to match your game's visual style, and use the custom palette controls to fit your engine's color limits. Create pixel art with advanced palettes to help you make the perfect sprite as a transparent PNG.

items.question: Can I adjust the pixel grid on my image?
items.answer: Absolutely. The live editor includes a "Show grid" option. This pixel grid overlay helps you see the individual pixels clearly, which is useful for fine-tuning your art or for learning how the pixelation effect works on your image.

items.question: What is the best way to convert a image to pixel art?
items.answer: For best results when you convert a image to pixel visuals, start with a high-contrast image. Use the pixel size slider to find a level of detail you like with custom palette settings. Create pixel art with larger sizes for a more abstract, 8-bit look, while smaller sizes retain more detail from the original image with advanced palettes.

items.question: Can I use the generated pixel art commercially?
items.answer: Yes. You own the rights to your original uploads and to the generated results. You can use graphics made with pixel Village for any purpose, including commercial projects. Create pixel art with our tools for unlimited commercial use.

items.question: Which formats can I use with this image pixelator?
items.answer: This image pixelator supports all common browser formats like PNG, JPG, GIF, and WEBP. You can convert a PNG to pixel visuals or a JPG to pixel visuals with ease. Create pixel art with any image format.

items.question: Why is this tool called pixel art Village?
items.answer: We believe that creating graphics is a community activity, even when using a tool online. pixel Village is a place where anyone, from beginner to pro, can gather to easily make pixel visuals with custom palettes. Create pixel art with our tools and join our welcoming village for all pixel enthusiasts.
